meanings.definition: To incorrectly assign a number to something.
meanings.sent1: I always misnumber my pages when I'm in a hurry.
meanings.sent2: Please double-check to make sure you don't misnumber the boxes.
meanings.sent3: I misnumbered the ingredients in the recipe and ended up with a strange dish.
meanings.sent4: Her habit of misnumbering dates made her miss important events.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misnumbering can be quite confusing.

meanings.definition: To count or label something inaccurately.
meanings.sent1: He tends to misnumber the items on the list without realizing it.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to misnumber the pages if you're not paying attention.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally misnumbered the students during roll call.
meanings.sent4: The misnumbered street signs led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent5: Misnumbering can cause a lot of unnecessary confusion.
